title: Revisor of statutes
context: PART II. STATUTE REVISION AND PUBLICATION Note Uniform electronic legal material act, see chapter 98. ยง23G-11 Revisor of statutes. The director of the office of the legislative reference bureau, or a member of the staff of the bureau delegated by the director, shall be the revisor of statutes of the State. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 8, pt of ยง1]
